name___comment.en: The theme's display name in the Themes menu.
name___comment.ja: 「テーマ」メニューでのテーマの表示名。

library_background___comment.en: The background color of the Script Library.
library_background___comment.ja: スクリプト ライブラリの背景色。

thumbnail_border___comment.en: The color of the borders between files in the Script Library.
thumbnail_border___comment.ja: The color of the borders between files in the Script Library.

default_text___comment.en: The default color of interface text.
default_text___comment.ja: The default color of interface text.

tint___comment.en: The tint color of interface buttons.
tint___comment.ja: The tint color of interface buttons.

text_selection_tint___comment.en: The tint color of the text selection and cursor.
text_selection_tint___comment.ja: The tint color of the text selection and cursor.

bar_background___comment.en: The background color of the toolbar and the active tab.
bar_background___comment.ja: The background color of the toolbar and the active tab.

tab_background___comment.en: The background color of inactive tabs.
tab_background___comment.ja: The background color of inactive tabs.

tab_title___comment.en: The color of the tab title text.
tab_title___comment.ja: The color of the tab title text.

separator_line___comment.en: The color of the separator line between toolbar/tabs and editor.
separator_line___comment.ja: The color of the separator line between toolbar/tabs and editor.

background___comment.en: The default background color of the editor.
background___comment.ja: The default background color of the editor.

gutter_background___comment.en: The background color of the line number column on the left side of the editor.
gutter_background___comment.ja: The background color of the line number column on the left side of the editor.

gutter_border___comment.en: The color of the border that separates the gutter from the editor.
gutter_border___comment.ja: The color of the border that separates the gutter from the editor.

line_number___comment.en: The color of the line numbers in the gutter.
line_number___comment.ja: The color of the line numbers in the gutter.

dark_keyboard___comment.en: Whether to use a dark onscreen keyboard.
dark_keyboard___comment.ja: Whether to use a dark onscreen keyboard.

font-size___comment.en: The default editor and console font size.
font-size___comment.ja: The default editor and console font size.

font-family___comment.en: The default editor and console font family.
font-family___comment.ja: The default editor and console font family.

scopes___comment.en: Formatting for various kinds of text in the editor. Formatting options are similar to CSS styles.
scopes___comment.ja: Formatting for various kinds of text in the editor. Formatting options are similar to CSS styles.

default___comment.en: Default text, for plain text files or text with no special meaning.
default___comment.ja: Default text, for plain text files or text with no special meaning.

module___comment.en: Python module names as part of import statements.
module___comment.ja: Python module names as part of import statements.

function___comment.en: Function names as part of a function call.
function___comment.ja: Function names as part of a function call.

builtinfunction___comment.en: Built-in function names as part of a function call.
builtinfunction___comment.ja: Built-in function names as part of a function call.

functiondef___comment.en: Function names as part of a function definition.
functiondef___comment.ja: Function names as part of a function definition.

classdef___comment.en: Class names as part of a class definition.
classdef___comment.ja: Class names as part of a class definition.

class___comment.en: Class names as part of a class instantiation.
class___comment.ja: Class names as part of a class instantiation.

escape___comment.en: Should probably be for escaped characters in string literals, but doesn't seem to do anything.
escape___comment.ja: Should probably be for escaped characters in string literals, but doesn't seem to do anything.

codeblock-start___comment.en: GitHub-style syntax highlighting instructions after code block start.
codeblock-start___comment.ja: GitHub-style syntax highlighting instructions after code block start.

tag___comment.en: Is this Taskpaper or HTML or what now?
tag___comment.ja: Is this Taskpaper or HTML or what now?
